name: Free The Lazy Dogs
description:
Welcome to Free The Lazy Dogs!

The game runs in a 1280 x 768 windowed screen, and you can adjust this as you need. This allows you to play and work on something else at the same time.

Free The Lazy Dogs is a puzzle video game where you create lines of block shapes, when a line is complete it is removed from the grid and pushes the Dog Warden back. The more lines you create at one time moves the Warden back farther and scores more bonus points. You also get a Dog Bonus for completing a set of 9 dogs.

Free The Lazy Dogs has the following features:


  • Background changes as you go higher in levels
  • Over 100 levels to gain!
  • Save/Load Game
  • Achivements
  • High Score and Line Count Tracking
  • Leaderboard
  • Cloud Saves
  • Sound Settings
  • Scoring Detail Counts
  • High Score
